hazma.decay_helper_functions package¶

Submodules¶

hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_charged_kaon module¶

hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_charged_kaon.Spectrum()¶

Returns the radiative spectrum dNde from charged kaon for a list of gamma ray energies.

Keyword arguments::
eng_gams: List of energies of photon in laboratory frame. eng_k: Energy of charged kaon in laboratory frame.
hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_charged_kaon.SpectrumPoint()¶

Returns the radiative spectrum value from charged kaon at a single gamma ray energy.

Keyword arguments::
eng_gam: Energy of photon is laboratory frame. eng_k: Energy of charged kaon in laboratory frame.

hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_charged_pion module¶

hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_charged_pion.Spectrum()¶

Returns the radiative spectrum dNde from charged pion given a gamma ray energies eng_gams and charged pion energy eng_pi. When the ChargedPion object is instatiated, an interplating function for the mu spectrum is computed.

Keyword arguments::
eng_gams: Gamma ray energies to evaluate spectrum. eng_pi: Energy of charged pion in laboratory frame.
hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_charged_pion.SpectrumPoint()¶

Returns the radiative spectrum value from charged pion given a gamma ray energy eng_gam and charged pion energy eng_pi. When the ChargedPion object is instatiated, an interplating function for the mu spectrum is computed.

Keyword arguments::
eng_gam: Energy of photon is laboratory frame. eng_pi: Energy of charged pion in laboratory frame.

hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_muon module¶

hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_muon.Spectrum()¶

Compute dN/dE from mu -> e nu nu gamma in the laborartory frame.

eng_gams : np.ndarray
List of gamma ray energies in laboratory frame.
eng_mu : float
Muon energy in laboratory frame.
Returns:spec – List of gamma ray spectrum values, dNdE, evaluated at eng_gams given muon energy eng_mu.
Return type:np.ndarray
hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_muon.SpectrumPoint()¶

Compute dN_{gamma}/dE_{gamma} from mu -> e nu nu gamma in the laborartory frame.

Keyword arguments::
eng_gam (float) – Gamma ray energy in laboratory frame. eng_mu (float) – Muon energy in laboratory frame.

hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_neutral_pion module¶

hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_neutral_pion.Spectrum()¶

Returns decay spectrum for pi0 -> g g.

hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_neutral_pion.SpectrumPoint()¶

Returns decay spectrum for pi0 -> g g.
